subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lorenzo Charles, the hero of North Carolina State’s title-winning upset of Houston in 1983, was remembered for more than his last-second dunk at his funeral held five days after he was killed in a single-vehicle bus wreck.
snippet: Lorenzo Charles, the hero of North Carolina State’s title-winning upset of Houston in 1983, was remembered for more than his last-second dunk at his funeral held five days after he was killed in a single-vehicle bus wreck.
